A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've seen it twice now. On Thursday I walked out of the theater a bit disappointed based on the spoiler-free review hype I had read. Then I saw it again with my expectations put in check and thought it was one of the better Star Wars movies. I would recommend everyone to go see the movie a second time. Certain things could have been better and certain things could have been cut out of the movie entirely but I don't get the low audience score at all.  \n\nAlso enjoyed the movie a lot more when it wasn't in 3D.
